description:
11.167 mix
Mix several video input streams into one video stream.

A description of the accepted options follows.

duration.description: Specify how end of stream is determined.

inputs.description: The number of inputs. If unspecified, it defaults to 2.

planes.description: Set which planes to filter. Default is all. Allowed range is from 0 to 15.

scale.description: Specify scale, if it is set it will be multiplied with sum of each weight multiplied with pixel values to give final destination pixel value. By default scale is auto scaled to sum of weights.

weights.description: Specify weight of each input video stream as sequence. Each weight is separated by space. If number of weights is smaller than number of frames last specified weight will be used for all remaining unset weights.

parameters.description: Specify weight of each input video stream as sequence. Each weight is separated by space. If number of weights is smaller than number of frames last specified weight will be used for all remaining unset weights.
parameters.name: weights

parameters.description: Specify scale, if it is set it will be multiplied with sum of each weight multiplied with pixel values to give final destination pixel value. By default scale is auto scaled to sum of weights.
parameters.name: scale

parameters.description: Set which planes to filter. Default is all. Allowed range is from 0 to 15.
parameters.name: planes

parameters.description:
Specify how end of stream is determined.

‘longest’

The duration of the longest input. (default)

‘shortest’

The duration of the shortest input.

‘first’

The duration of the first input.
parameters.name: duration

source:
11.167 mix

Mix several video input streams into one video stream.

A description of the accepted options follows.

inputs

The number of inputs. If unspecified, it defaults to 2.

weights

Specify weight of each input video stream as sequence. Each weight is separated by space. If number of weights is smaller than number of frames last specified weight will be used for all remaining unset weights.

scale

Specify scale, if it is set it will be multiplied with sum of each weight multiplied with pixel values to give final destination pixel value. By default scale is auto scaled to sum of weights.

planes

Set which planes to filter. Default is all. Allowed range is from 0 to 15.

duration

Specify how end of stream is determined.

‘longest’

The duration of the longest input. (default)

‘shortest’

The duration of the shortest input.

‘first’

The duration of the first input.
